channel.title: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I really appreciate you guys visiting the site everyn now and then and im sorry i havnt updated it as much as i would of liked but the information that is there i hope you all find usefull.
Please rate the new template and maybe post some ideas / comments on it. And if you like maybe some constructive critasism :) By the way my host is ad free so as soon as i get enough money i will get a real domain and toss the ad's away :)
link - www.scar-resources.ir8.ca
thankyou for looking,
solemn wishes.

item.title: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

cool pyro, thx for confimring that for me hmm thestrain might be your resolution but i must admit here is quite alot of text present

Im looking into making the site a bit more interactive so hopefully i can update you guys on that when it comes along. If you guys wouldnt mind looking at the Affiliates thats would be great and any ideas to build form what i allready have is also very much appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

Hey i have dialup. Meh broadband is far to exspensive here. You pay a ridiculous price only to still have download caps etc.

But ron page didnt load to slow for me so its ok. Gah its a bit of a strain on the eyes though the page. Although it may just be my res

item.title: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

what is this dial-up you speak of? thankx for poiting that out ron, im going to jpg that as soon as i get home (doing my gcse ict atm

Einstein was on the original template so i thought why not

and the srl tutorial is kinda like a remake of dylock’s download scar page

thx guys…

better than the old template :D?

item.source: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site

item.title: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site
item.dc:creator: @Galook Galook
item.description:
@Galook wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:2, topic:13892”]Remember these are just my opinions so don’t get mad or anything.

The titles/logo.png is over 100 KB. That’s bad for page loads and for people who have dial up.

What’s with the einstein picture?

I really don’t like the links increasing in size to such an extent where it moves the other links by an inch on my screen lol. Just make it 1 pixel bigger when the mouse is over it, or just keep it the same height and just make the link turn white.

When going to the SRL tutorial page, it’s not combined with your style. It just goes to a completely different design.

Overall I would give it a 7/10. :)[/quote]

ppl still have dialup? :S

Read full topic
item.source: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site

item.title: Scar Resources has a new template :) - my site
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Remember these are just my opinions so don’t get mad or anything.

The titles/logo.png is over 100 KB. That’s bad for page loads and for people who have dial up.

What’s with the einstein picture?

I really don’t like the links increasing in size to such an extent where it moves the other links by an inch on my screen lol. Just make it 1 pixel bigger when the mouse is over it, or just keep it the same height and just make the link turn white.

When going to the SRL tutorial page, it’s not combined with your style. It just goes to a completely different design.

Overall I would give it a 7/10.

Read full topic
